item.title: Using LPC 2148 in IOT applications
item.description: Using LPC 2148 in IOT applications The LPC2148 is a microcontroller produced by NXP Semiconductors. It’s based on a 16-bit/32-bit ARM7TDMI-S CPU with real-time emulation and embedded trace support, that combines the microcontroller with embedded high-speed flash memory. Here are some of the key hardware specifications of the LPC2148: Processor: 16-bit/32-bit ARM7TDMI-S CPU with a clock speed of up to 60 MHz. Memory: 512KB of on-chip static RAM and 32KB of on-chip flash program memory.
